title: Maruti Suzuki surpasses 2 million car deliveries via Indian Railways
description: Maruti Suzuki has surpassed a significant milestone by delivering over 2 million cars via Indian railways, becoming the first Indian automaker to achieve this environmental feat. This accomplishment was revealed by the company on Monday.
